description:
Versioning when using Git, solved.

Versioning when using Git, solved.
GitVersion looks at your git history and works out the Semantic Version of the commit being built.
As part of this release we had 26 commits which resulted in 6 issues being closed.Bugs
- #4159 [ISSUE]: GitVersion tool is slow / stalls
- #4192 [ISSUE]: Building with target framework net8.0-windows requires a <GitVersionTargetFramework>
Dependencies
- !4263 (deps): Bump MSBuild.ProjectCreation to 13.0.0
Documentation
- #4219 [Docs]: Confusing/missing documentation around strategies
- !4262 Fix remark lint
